text:
Leroy Newton Suddath (February 21, 1931 – February 27, 2020) was a major general in the United States Army. He was commissioned in 1956 after graduation from the United States Military Academy. Suddath was commander of the 1st Special Operations Command before his retirement in 1988. He was born in Savannah, Georgia.
Suddathon died at the age of 89 on February 27, 2020 in Savannah.
